long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension automatically unblurs / unhides media posts that were marked sensitive by clicking the "Show" button on Twitter/X . The extension leaves the Hide button intact so you can hide content you might actually want hidden after all.

Zero user configuration. Hassle-free media viewing on Twitter/X! UwU

Update: 2024-08-28 Updated a bug where the users on the side panel would get followed or unfollowed by accident. Added more strict way of determining warning buttons.

Update 2028-04-17: Fixed the "Hide" button overlapping video controls when unblurred
